wikipedia_page.main: John Andrew Davidson, 2nd Viscount Davidson (22 December 1928 – 20 July 2012), was a British peer and Conservative politician. Conservative politician regarded as a safe pair of hands he became deputy chief whip in the House of Lords.

response: *John Andrew Davidson, 2nd Viscount Davidson (1928–2012), British politician
